title: Next.js isn't React
description: Next.js is a powerful and popular JavaScript framework that extends React to provide additional features for building dynamic and performant web applications. Although Next.js is built on top of React and is often used with it, it is important to note that Next.js is a separate framework with its own unique set of capabilities, such as server-side rendering, static site generation, and routing. By leveraging the strengths of Next.js alongside React, developers can create modern and efficient web applications that offer enhanced functionality and user experiences.
